trangel.race.lesser_angel.notes: A spiritual lifeform similar to demons known to wreck havoc on the world every 500 years.
trangel.race.greater_angel.notes: The evolution of a lesser angel with an ego.
trangel.race.archangel.notes: Only few angels make it to that point because of their undevelopped ego.
trangel.race.cherub.notes: The second most powerful type of angel known.
trangel.race.fallen_greater_angel.notes: The evolution of a lesser angel with an ego.
trangel.race.fallen_archangel.notes: Only few angels make it to that point because of their undevelopped ego.
trangel.race.fallen_cherub.notes: The second most powerful type of angel known.
trangel.race.fallen_seraphim.notes: The ultimate evolution of angels, only an angel that has a name, a body, and that has achieved divinity can become a Seraphim.
trangel.race.phantom.notes: A demi-spiritual creature born in the Underworld by the magicules of the World Destroying Dragon.
trangel.race.field_officer.notes: The evolution of a Phantom with an ego, now having the ability to split bodies.
trangel.race.general.notes: A commanding officer of the Phantom army.
trangel.race.staff_officer.notes: A commanding officer of the Phantom army.
trangel.race.mystic_angel.notes: A Seraphim that got corrupted by the magicules of the World Destroying Dragon, but still kept their status as holy beings.
